required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Exercises Associated or Not With Manual Therapy Shoulder Impingement

brief_summary.textblock: Manual therapy combined with a protocol of therapeutic exercises will increase the beneficial effects on scapular kinematics, myofascial pain and function in subjects with shoulder impingement when compared to exercises only.

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 3 months from the initial interview

intervention.description: Mobilization; massage; post-isometric relaxation; strengthening; stretching
